short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The one and only real omnichain wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reunit Wallet is an open source omnichain cryptocurrency wallet.

Here are some of the key features:
1 - Cross-chain transfer
2 - Real-time simulation before each transaction / signature
3 - Hardware wallet supported
